Text: I can confirm that this 100% does not work

works 100%

have to manually edit host file.
System32/drivers/etc/host

add to the very bottom of host file. save!

127.0.0.1 www.keywordindex.com

Are you sure the software is functioning? I have tried to search the keyword "christmas music" and it gives only 10 searches. However, when I used the demo version, the searches are much more than the business edition.

Hi,

wilsonljx is right. It does run okay if you "doctor" the hosts file.  You have to open the "hosts" file with notepad.  

Add, 

127.0.0.1 www.keywordindex.com
127.0.0.1 keywordindex.com
127.0.0.1 www.axandra.com
127.0.0.1 axandra.com

to the bottom of the "hosts" file above the line "::1             localhost"

Save the file as "hosts.txt" to the documents folder.

Rename the "hosts" file in "System32/drivers/etc/hosts" to "hosts-old060112" or something like it.

Rename the new "hosts.txt" in the documents folder to "hosts".  Then copy this new "hosts" file to "System32/drivers/etc/hosts".

Run IBP Arelis.  Enter "Cool Release" and the code.

The problem is no updates are possible because the new "hosts" file stops the program from accessing the internet.

Ty

I have tried your way but the serial key won't work. Can you teach me by emailing me at wilsonljx@yahoo.com

Much Appreciated!
